title: Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park: Soldiers
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People     Soldiers                 Soldiers         Private John Chase NPS Photo      John Chase   1843-1914   Medal of Honor recipient for service at the Battle of Chancellorsville          Thomas R.R. Cobb NPS Image     Thomas R.R. Cobb   1823 - 1862 Confederate General commanding troops at the Sunken Road during the Battle of Fredericksburg          George Murray NPS Image   George Murray 1844-1910 Union soldier who participated in the Battle of Fredericksburg at Prospect Hill         John Pelham NPS Image    John Pelham   1838-1863 Confederate cavalryman who earns the moniker "the gallant Pelham" for his actions at Fredericksburg
